description:
Fix most tests in //components/autofill/content to not depend on //chrome.

BUG=140037

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=207859

messages.text:
https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc
File components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc#oldcode97
components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc:97: profile_.CreateRequestContext();
Why is it OK to remove these calls (here and in the other tests)?

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc
File components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc#newcode112
components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc:112: content::TestBrowserThread io_thread_;
Is this still needed?

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc
File components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc#oldcode97
components/autofill/content/browser/autocheckout/whitelist_manager_unittest.cc:97: profile_.CreateRequestContext();
On 2013/06/19 15:34:52, blundell wrote:
> Why is it OK to remove these calls (here and in the other tests)?

In this test, because the URLRequestContextGetter that this creates is not actually being used.

In the other tests, because content::TestBrowserContext which replaces TestingProfile, creates the URLRequestContextGetter implicitly, not on a specific method call.

Tests pass fine after the change, at least locally and I am hopeful on trybots too.

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc
File components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/17465003/diff/5001/components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc#newcode112
components/autofill/content/browser/wallet/encryption_escrow_client_unittest.cc:112: content::TestBrowserThread io_thread_;
On 2013/06/19 15:34:52, blundell wrote:
> Is this still needed?

I'm not sure; let me test.

Looks like the io_thread_ thing was no longer needed in a couple of tests; uploaded a new patchset that removes it.

Cheers,
JÃ³i

+isherman@ to sanity check removal of TestBrowserThread IO thread thingies from tests (blundell@ already reviewed the change).

+phajdan.jr@ for "new" DEPS for //chrome/browser/test (actually just moving an existing one I think).

LGTM with a comment.

components/autofill/content/browser/DEPS:33: "+chrome/test/base/chrome_render_view_host_test_harness.h",
Why not "!" ?
